org.fiware.cybercaptor.server.remediation

Class RuleReference

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.fiware.cybercaptor.server.remediation.RuleReference

  • public class RuleReference
extends Object
    Class to manage the references options contained in a snort rule
    Author:
    Francois -Xavier Aguessy

        public boolean loadFromDatabase(Connection conn,
                       int id_reference)
                         throws SQLException
        Function to load from the database a reference from an id
        Parameters:
        conn - The database connection
        id_reference - the id of the reference
        Returns:
        true if the id is in the database, else false
        Throws:
        SQLException - the sQL exception
